description: The Sabaody Archipelago is the final island in Paradise before the Red Line. Despite being called an archipelago, it is actually a massive mangrove forest growing out from the middle of the ocean, with each of the 79 giant Yarukiman Mangrove trees serving as an 'island' or 'grove' where people live. The area is known for its bubble-producing trees, lawless zones, and being a hub for human trafficking due to its proximity to the World Government's headquarters.
culture: Mixed - lawless zones and civilized areas
significance: The last island in Paradise and the staging ground before entering the New World. A major hub for pirates, slave traders, and those seeking to coat their ships for the underwater journey to Fish-Man Island.
keyFeatures: 79 groves, each numbered and serving different purposes
Giant Yarukiman Mangrove trees that produce bubbles
Human auction house and slave trading center
Ship coating services for underwater travel
Lawless zones where Marines rarely patrol
No magnetic pull for Log Pose since it's not a traditional island

statusHistory.description: Operating as a major hub for pirates and traders near the Red Line

keyEvents.title: Sabaody's Slave Trade Revealed
keyEvents.description: Pappag explains that human trafficking is a booming business in Sabaody, with multiple kidnapping crews operating in the area.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the dark reality of the slave trade at Sabaody Archipelago.

keyEvents.title: Approaching Sabaody Archipelago
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats approach the area near Sabaody Archipelago while following Camie to rescue Hatchan.
keyEvents.significance: The crew's first approach to the final island in Paradise.

reveals.information: Not a true archipelago but a massive mangrove forest with 79 numbered groves
Final island in Paradise, close to the Red Line
Major hub for human trafficking and slave trading
Multiple kidnapping crews operate in the area, including Flying Fish Riders and Macro Pirates

name.japanese: トビウオライダーズのアジト

description: The headquarters of the Flying Fish Riders kidnapping gang, located five kilometers east of Grove 44 of the Sabaody Archipelago. This base serves as the operations center for Duval's crew and their human trafficking activities.
significance: The base where Hatchan is held captive and where Duval waits to confront the Straw Hat Pirates, particularly Sanji.
keyFeatures: Base of operations for Flying Fish Riders

statusHistory.description: Operating as Flying Fish Riders headquarters

keyEvents.title: Duval at His Base
keyEvents.description: Duval appears at the Flying Fish Riders base, declaring his intent for revenge as the Straw Hats approach.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of Duval at his headquarters, setting up the confrontation.

keyEvents.title: The Trap Confirmed
keyEvents.description: Macro reports to Duval at the base that he successfully lured Camie, confirming the kidnapping was a trap.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the base as the location where the trap for the Straw Hats is set.

reveals.information: Located 5 kilometers east of Grove 44 of Sabaody Archipelago
Headquarters for Flying Fish Riders kidnapping operations
